Key Insight: 96% agree that Christian community helps with pressure
Implication: Foster small groups and peer support

Key Insight: Top 3 coping methods: Testimonies, Worship, Mentorship
Implication: Design interventions around testimony-sharing and worship events

Key Insight: Church workers show higher agreement with mentorship and thanksgiving
Implication: Train mentors and encourage personal discipline practices
Engagement strategies should reinforce and retain their high involvement
Target motivational tools and mentorship for young men
Provide more structured discipleship for young females
